body:
Split off of #13112 

Installed bazel 1.2.0 with Clang 11.0.0, Python 3.7.4, and JDK 1.8.0_231-b11 on macOS 10.15.1. Unit tests pass.

- [x] Add a lot of new versions
- [x] Add patches for all versions
- [x] Make sure patches apply to all versions
- [x] Make sure some versions actually build
- [x] Make sure some packages can be built with this bazel installation
- [x] Remove complexity in patches for passing Spack env vars
- [x] Remove complexity in `setup_dependent_package`
- [x] Add unit tests

Fixes #12398 
Fixes #11850
Closes #11120
Closes #10422

@jcftang @aweits @obreitwi @rubendibattista @dodo47 @healther
title: Add latest version of bazel
